tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE gender_based_violence_statistics (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(50),
  victim_gender VARCHAR(10),
  perpetrator_name VARCHAR(50),
  incident_date DATE,
  judicial_outcome VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE gender_violence_cases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(50),
  victim_gender VARCHAR(10),
  incident_date DATE,
  judicial_outcome VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE judicial_outcomes (
  outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  outcome VARCHAR(50),
  court_name VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES gender_violence_cases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GenderBasedViolenceCases (
  case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  victim_name VARCHAR(50),
  victim_gender VARCHAR(10),
  incident_date DATE,
  judicial_outcome VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE JudicialOutcomes (
  outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  outcome_description TEXT,
  trial_date DATE,
  verdict VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES GenderBasedViolenceCases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CaseLocations (
  location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  case_id INT,
  location_name VARCHAR(100),
  city VARCHAR(50),
  state VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES GenderBasedViolenceCases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GenderBasedViolenceCases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    victim_name VARCHAR(50),
    offender_name VARCHAR(50),
    incident_date DATE,
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE JudicialOutcomes (
    outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT, 
    verdict VARCHAR(50),
    sentencing VARCHAR(50),
    verdict_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES GenderBasedViolenceCases(case_id)
);

CREATE TABLE PolicyEvaluation (
    evaluation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    case_id INT,
    outcome_id INT,
    agency_id INT,
    evaluation_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES GenderBasedViolenceCases(case_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (outcome_id) REFERENCES JudicialOutcomes(outcome_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES ReportingAgencies(agency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE GenderViolenceCases (
 case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 case_description TEXT,
 reported_date DATE,
 gender_of_victim VARCHAR(255),
 gender_of_perpetrator VARCHAR(255),
 outcome VARCHAR(255),
 judicial_outcome TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Victims (
 victim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 victim_name VARCHAR(255),
 victim_age INT,
 victim_gender VARCHAR(255),
 victim_occupation VARCHAR(255),
 case_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES GenderViolenceCases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Perpetrators (
 perpetrator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 perpetrator_name VARCHAR(255),
 perpetrator_age INT,
 perpetrator_gender VARCHAR(255),
 perpetrator_relationship VARCHAR(255),
 case_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES GenderViolenceCases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE LegalActions (
 action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 action_type VARCHAR(255),
 action_date DATE,
 case_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (case_id) REFERENCES GenderViolenceCases(case_id)
)

CREATE TABLE JudicialOutcomes (
 outcome_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 outcome_type VARCHAR(255),
 outcome_description TEXT,
 action_id INT,
 FOREIGN KEY (action_id) REFERENCES LegalActions(action_id)
)
